title: Fever Dream _ The Clefnikov Experience Art

[[=]]
+ **Fever Dream**
[[/=]]
[[include component:image-block
|name=ClfnkvExp.PNG
|caption=**The Clefnikov Experienceâ„¢'s Fanart_Fever Dream**
|width=80%
|align=center]]
    

[[=]]
[[div class="evenflowery"]]
@@ @@
In the dark, two candles' lights flickered, sharing the dimly lit warmth for a brief moment.
  
It only lasted while the darkness was enveloping it. When the sun rises, the wax will eventually melt and the candles cease to exist.
   
And the waves will, eventually, wash their traces away. The colors were never intertwined. Or did they?
  
Everything ends, as though it had never started.
[[/div]]


@@ @@
[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-clefnikov-experience Find the source of the Astronomical Phenomena?] 
[[/=]]
